text: Abbott and Costello Meet Frankenstein is a 1948 American horror comedy movie directed by Charles Barton and starring Bud Abbott, Lou Costello, Lon Chaney Jr., Bela Lugosi and Glenn Strange. It was distributed by Universal Pictures. == Other websites == * * * Category:1948 movies Category:1940s horror movies Category:1940s science fiction movies Category:1948 comedy movies Category:American monster movies Category:American parody movies Category:American sequel movies Category:American science fiction horror movies Category:American buddy comedy movies Category:Comedy horror movies Category:English-language movies Category:Movies set in Florida Category:Movies set in London Category:Universal Pictures movies Category:Frankenstein movies
title: Abbott and Costello Meet Frankenstein
